title: flash deals dmg :D
body: tryndamare used flash on me and i died

replies.body: I got killed by revive 2-3 days ago :D
It's ironic because Revive killed you post-mortem. When it is supposed to bring you back to life and is itself, dead. There are so many layers of metaphor in that...

Pretty sure Revive is actually Sun-fire Capes' AoE damage from what I've seen.  I've seen it on a couple of occasions but, its very awkward to see you were killed by Revive.  They're all legitimate damage sources, I guess they never felt the need to put in damage sources for items.
I know, my post was something called *humor*.

It'd be even more ironic if post-death Sion killed you.
Man, that'd be deep.

One of these days Rito might just fix death recaps so they actually remotely make some sort of sense.

The issues with death recaps are known, and I rarely see one that makes any sort of sense.

It would be very helpful to know what is killing me so I could build against it, rather than trying to figure out what {{summoner:4}}  is actually supposed to stand for...

Or how I died when supposedly only 14% of my health was taken. That's been a recent issue for me whenever I play tanks is that supposedly only 10-30% of my health was supposedly taken but I still died.

Once upon a time I checked my death recap because I died EXTREMELY fast. I checked it like 400 from the ADC, 800 from mid, and 600 from Akali(I'm rounding of course, and I was the ADC, so I was squishy.)  I was staring at it for like the full 50~ seconds I was dead, soon to revive I closed it and hit tab to check and see their champions.  I found that they had no Akali on their team.

The Phantom of Akali had stricken me into oblivion.  {{champion:84}} {{item:3070}}
i died to spirit visage once
Flash didnt kill you. Riot has bugs often like I remember the flash icon was pulsing on sunfire cape a couple moths ago. It probably just was bugged and said flash killed you.
Flash pulsing on sunfire cape sounds like a graphics card issue.
And I also say on a video that the player killed the flash icon. These bugs happen sometimes
it procs shiv also!!!!!!!!!!! it even crit for the bonus damage

Finally! I've been waiting for this to be a thing. Need that extra aggressive damage for all-ins xD


Seriously though, that was probably an auto.
hmmmmmmm i never knew that lol wtf?
